name: Slicer Starter Kit
listing_title: Slicer Starter Kit: Pre-Tuned Cura Profiles + Settings Guide for Perfect Prints
listing_description:
Stop guessing your slicer settings. This kit gives you three ready-to-import Cura profiles for PLA, PETG, and TPU, plus a settings guide that explains the 10 most important settings in plain English.

Optimized for the Ender 3 and Ender 3 V2, but the guide works with any FDM printer and any slicer. You'll also get a printable first-print checklist so you never forget a step.

These profiles were tested and tuned over dozens of prints. They're not default settings with a new name. Every value was chosen for a reason, and the guide explains why.

This kit is for people who want to spend less time tweaking and more time printing. Import the profiles, read the guide, and start getting better prints today.
bullet_points: 3 pre-tuned Cura profiles: PLA, PETG, and TPU for Ender 3/V2
Complete settings guide explaining the 10 most important slicer settings
Side-by-side comparison table for PLA vs PETG vs TPU settings
Visual troubleshooting guide: see the problem, find the fix
Printable first-print checklist for every material
Works with Cura 5.x. Guide applies to any slicer including OrcaSlicer and PrusaSlicer
